gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
steps: Add fields using the 'Add Field' button
Configure each field with name, type, and options
Set the number of records to generate
Click 'Generate Data' to create fake data

examples.date: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, use options for year range
examples.pattern: Use pattern field for regex generation
examples.unique: Check unique option to avoid duplicates
examples.distribution: Choose normal, uniform, or exponential for numbers

nullValues.title: NULL Values
nullValues.desc: Set percentage of NULL values using the % field (0-100)

unique.title: Unique Values
unique.desc: Enable unique constraint in advanced options to prevent duplicates

pattern.title: Pattern Matching
pattern.desc: Use regular expressions for string fields (e.g., [A-Z]{3}-\d{4})

distribution.title: Data Distribution
distribution.desc: Choose normal, uniform, or exponential distribution for numeric fields

templates.title: Templates
templates.desc: Use built-in templates or save your own configurations:

list.userProfile: Basic user information with contact details
